Class MousePositionRelativeInput

Namespace
osu.Framework.Input.StateChanges
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Denotes a relative change of mouse position. Pointing devices such as mice provide relative positional input.

public class MousePositionRelativeInput : IInput

Fields

Delta

The change in position. This will be added to the current position. When the current position is not valid, no changes will be made.

public Vector2 Delta

Field Value

Vector2

Methods

Apply(InputState, IInputStateChangeHandler)

Applies input to an InputState. This alters the InputState and propagates the change to an IInputStateChangeHandler.

public void Apply(InputState state, IInputStateChangeHandler handler)

Parameters

state InputState

The InputState to apply changes to.

handler IInputStateChangeHandler

The IInputStateChangeHandler to handle changes to state.
